name: Space Scums 2
description:
Space Scums 2: Captain Bostic's Bounty is an illustrated text adventure in which you, the Lizard Captain Barry Bostic, tries to save his own skin from a bounty hunter, as well as a deadly virus. Visit planets such as Esimo, Khallara, and Pepto, trying to avoid Jonah Linslaw and an aggressive force of nature.

Play Space Scums 2 online: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/n3_w-u-yp0glzftw_rqwcw/space-scums-2
